name: subgraph-protocol-v2
description: This package contains subgraph of the protocol v2

scripts.update-abi-addresses: yarn run update-address && yarn run prepare:abi
scripts.prepare:all: yarn run prepare:contracts && yarn run prepare:subgraph
scripts.prepare:contracts: yarn run protocol:install && yarn run protocol:compile-contracts
scripts.prepare:contracts:local: yarn run protocol:install && yarn run deploy-contracts && yarn run update-address
scripts.protocol:install: yarn run protocol:init && git submodule foreach npm install --no-save --no-fund --no-audit
scripts.protocol:compile-contracts: git submodule foreach yarn run compile
scripts.protocol:deploy-contracts: git submodule foreach yarn run aave:docker:dev:migration
scripts.protocol:deploy:scenario: git submodule foreach yarn run test-subgraph:scenarios
scripts.deploy-contracts: yarn run protocol:compile-contracts && yarn run protocol:deploy-contracts
scripts.deploy-stack:local: yarn run prepare:all && yarn run subgraph:local
scripts.deploy-stack:local:scenario: yarn run protocol:deploy:scenario && yarn run update-abi-addresses && yarn run prepare:subgraph && yarn run subgraph:local
scripts.deploy-stack:local:post-scenario: yarn run update-abi-addresses && yarn run prepare:subgraph && yarn run subgraph:deploy:local
scripts.deploy:hosted:kovan: BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=kovan env-cmd yarn run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2-kovan env-cmd yarn run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet: BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd yarn run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2 env-cmd yarn run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:matic: BLOCKCHAIN=matic NETWORK=matic env-cmd yarn run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/aave-v2-matic env-cmd yarn run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:mumbai: BLOCKCHAIN=matic NETWORK=mumbai env-cmd yarn run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/aave-v2-polygon-mumbai env-cmd yarn run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:xdai: BLOCKCHAIN=xdai NETWORK=xdai env-cmd yarn run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=Agave-DAO/v2-xdai env-cmd yarn run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:self-hosted:kovan: BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=kovan yarn run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2-kovan yarn run subgraph:deploy:self-hosted
scripts.deploy:self-hosted:mainnet: BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=mainnet yarn run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2 yarn run subgraph:deploy:self-hosted
scripts.deploy:local:matic: BLOCKCHAIN=matic NETWORK=matic env-cmd yarn run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/aave-v2-matic env-cmd yarn run subgraph:deploy:local
scripts.deploy:local:xdai: BLOCKCHAIN=xdai NETWORK=xdai env-cmd yarn run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=Agave-DAO/v2-xdai env-cmd yarn run subgraph:deploy:local
scripts.deploy:local:rinkeby: BLOCKCHAIN=xdai NETWORK=rinkeby env-cmd yarn run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=Agave-DAO/v2-rinkeby env-cmd yarn run subgraph:deploy:local

author: Agave Team
